    • run

      public void run()
      This is the run method of server. This is active all the time and accept the socket of client. After create a thread for Connection of each client.

    • timeout

      public void timeout​(java.lang.String name)
      Method called when the the read() on the socket times out. It send a message to other players and close all the other connections.
      Parameters:
      name - of the player disconnected

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This method ends the game and close all the connection
